item.title: Compiling tbronzwaer/raptor
item.description: Introduction This post documents steps required to compile tbronzwaer/raptor and use plotter.py Dependencies Ubuntu 18.04 Install Ubuntu 18.04 as a VM. (https://releases.ubuntu.com/18.04/) Build Dependencies sudo apt install gcc build-essential gfortran libpng-dev GNU Scientific computing Library (GSL) GSL needs to be compiled from source. cd ~ git clone https://github.com/ampl/gsl.git cd gsl mkdir build && cd build cmake .. -G"Unix Makefiles" -DNO_AMPL_BINDINGS=1 make sudo make install CBLAS library (Basic Linear Algebra Subprograms) Build blas_LINUX.
